column5: Just wanted to say hope everyone here has a great week.  We are leaving tomorrow for 7 days in the Dominican Republic enjoying the sun (and some other things).  Have a couple fishing trips planned so hopefully something to report when I get home.  Have a great week, if you are on the ice, good luck and be safe.  Steve
Have a great time and you play safe as well. We like fish pics...a LOT!
Have a great time!!  We promise to have some ice when you return.  Don't get burned.  Bring back some sun.  Have fun!
have a great week yourself also as my wife and I are off to a Carribean cruise next week also. and by the time we return there should be some good ice for fishing.
Have a great time!  Looking forward to some pics of fishies!!!
Have fun and we all look forward to the fishing pics!
have a blast! catch some fish , take some pics!
